statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

article.description: San Francisco rallies for 69-62 OT victory over Santa Clara

article.headline: San Francisco rallies for 69-62 OT victory over Santa Clara

images.name: 1H SF M. Tollefsen made Dunk. Assisted by M. Christiansen.
images.caption: 1H (13:58) SF Mark Tollefsen made Dunk. Assisted by Matt Christiansen.

article.linkText: San Francisco rallies for 69-62 OT victory over Santa Clara
article.story: SAN FRANCISCO -- Tim Derksen had 18 points, including a key basket in the final minute of overtime, as San Francisco beat Santa Clara 69-62, snapping a five-game skid on Thursday night. The Dons (10-16, 4-10 West Coast) forced overtime after trailing most of the game and outscored Santa Clara 11-4 in the extra period. Devin Watson fed Derksen with 38 seconds left in overtime for an easy finish, putting San Francisco up 67-62. Watson finished with 13 points, Kruize Pinkins added 12 and Matt Christiansen 10. Santa Clara (11-15, 5-9) led for a 12-minute stretch until Mark Tollefsen's free throws with 1:21 left in the second half capped an 8-0 run and gave the Dons a 58-56 lead. Brandon Clark capped the scoring in regulation on a jumper with 56 seconds left. Clark had 21 points and eight assists as the Broncos dropped their fifth straight.
